contents: I just need to know the range of your fluctuations by repeatedly requesting the number, then I set an array, say {5,10,20,30,50}, which are number of accounts ready to like the anonymous comment. If 5 accounts doesn’t make a change in the number beyond the range, I try 10 accounts. If 10 doesn’t work, I’ll try 20, and so on. As long as I have enough accounts to like, I will eventually know the number of accounts needed to make a significant change over the range you set, regardless of your rules.
